scripts.prepublish: node node_modules/ometa-js/bin/ometajs2js --input lf-to-abstract-sql.ometajs --output lf-to-abstract-sql.js && node node_modules/ometa-js/bin/ometajs2js --input lf-to-abstract-sql-prep.ometajs --output lf-to-abstract-sql-prep.js && node node_modules/ometa-js/bin/ometajs2js --input sbvr-compiler-libs.ometajs --output sbvr-compiler-libs.js
